stages.logText: Facutloni asked me to help him deliver all of the items ordered by his customers a long time ago. He even gave me an old document with the names and items written on it.
Arcir the Fallhaven book-lover ordered 'Dusty Old book'.
Edrin the Brimhaven metalsmith ordered 'Striped Hammer'.
Odirath the Stoutford armorer ordered 'Pretty Porcelain Figure'.
Venanra the Brimhaven laundress ordered 'Old, worn cape'.
Tjure the unluckiest Brimhaven merchant ordered 'Mysterious green something'.
Arghes the Remgard merchant ordered 'Yellow boot'.
Wyre the mournful Vilegard woman ordered 'Lyre'.
Pangitain the Brimhaven fortune teller ordered Crystal Globe.
Facutloni wants me to report back after the delivery.
I reported back to Facutloni. He is very glad.
